summary: Okay, I just watched the interview and the reporter really just sits there, mouth open and re-thinkig his entire interview and...
question: Okay, I just watched the interview and the reporter really just sits there, mouth open and re-thinkig his entire interview and the answers dan and phil gave and its really hilarious because dan and phil aren´t even aware that the guy has the hole interview flashing before his eyes... :D thank you for sharing this truly eye opening moment of the interviewer with us, it made my whole evening :D
answer: Haha right?? I rewatch this video so frequently lol it’s incredible!!

body:
violet afire

CHAPTER 19

rating: m

word count: 3k (73.1k total)

summary: When Dan Howell catches word of fires being set in the fields near his home, he’s not wrong to suspect there are Reds, or those marked as societal threats, behind it. Dan, himself, is a Blue, marked as morally correct. But when Dan keeps accidentally running into a strange, black haired Red on his property, he begins to wonder if maybe the Blues aren’t the good guys after all.

[read on ao3]

[read from start]

tags: im literally person a it annoys me so much
summary:
Person A: You know when peope say their going to pull an all nighter? 
Person B: *stares intensely at A*
Person A: I know they...
body:
Person A: You know when peope say their going to pull an all nighter?

Person B: *stares intensely at A*

Person A: I know they mean from the sun going down to the sun going up but it should really be till 12am because then its morning! Don’t even get me stared with people who say they stay up all night, thats pretty frickin’ easy!

reblog.comment:

tags: i think about this a lot lol
summary: I will never forget that one American interview where half way through the interviewer suddenly realized that Dan and Phil live...
body: I will never forget that one American interview where half way through the interviewer suddenly realized that Dan and Phil live together and was like “wait, you work together AND you live together?” and they were like “lol yes, so anyways…” And you could just see it in his eyes that he was rethinking everything that was said before and going through it in his mind, trying to understand if he missed them saying anything about being together or something like that

reblog.comment: I will never forget that one American interview where half way through the interviewer suddenly realized that Dan and Phil live together and was like “wait, you work together AND you live together?” and they were like “lol yes, so anyways…” And you could just see it in his eyes that he was rethinking everything that was said before and going through it in his mind, trying to understand if he missed them saying anything about being together or something like that

trail.content_raw: I will never forget that one American interview where half way through the interviewer suddenly realized that Dan and Phil live together and was like “wait, you work together AND you live together?” and they were like “lol yes, so anyways…” And you could just see it in his eyes that he was rethinking everything that was said before and going through it in his mind, trying to understand if he missed them saying anything about being together or something like that
trail.content: I will never forget that one American interview where half way through the interviewer suddenly realized that Dan and Phil live together and was like “wait, you work together AND you live together?” and they were like “lol yes, so anyways…” And you could just see it in his eyes that he was rethinking everything that was said before and going through it in his mind, trying to understand if he missed them saying anything about being together or something like that
